definition[0]: someone who is dedicated works very hard at what they do because they care a lot about it
example[2]: The Woodland Trust is dedicated to preserving our native woodland.
definition[1]: made for or used for only one particular purpose
definition[2]: a dedicated computer, computer system etc is only used for one particular job, such as controlling a particular machine
example[4]: The data can be accessed by a dedicated machine or a personal computer.
